name: Dottler

evolution.description: Dottler can evolve into Orbeetle at level 7 and above. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 16 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Radome Pokémon. It barely moves, but it's still alive. Hiding in its shell without food or water seems to have awakened its psychic powers.

abilities.name: Swarm
abilities.description: This Pokémon doubles its STAB bonus when it has 25% or less of its maximum health.

abilities.name: Compound Eyes
abilities.description: This Pokémon gets an additional +1 to attack rolls.

abilities.name: Telepathy
abilities.description: This Pokémon cannot be damaged by its allies' attacks.
